descriptionHtml:
[center]Adiciona encatamentos simples com o efeito do shout dragon aspect (Pode ser desencantando)
[color=#00ff00]Add simple enchantment  with shout dragon aspect effect ([/color][color=#00ff00]It can be disenchanting)

[/color][size=3]Precisa DLC DRAGONBORN
[color=#00ff00]Need DRAGONBORN DLC[/color][/size]

[color=#f4f4f4][size=5]>>> [u]Não substitui a armadura original <<<[/u][/size][/color][u][size=5]
>>> Not replace the original armor <<<[/size]

[/u]Como conseguir a armadura? / [color=#00ff00]How to get the armor?[/color]
A armadura esta localizada na PEDRA DA SERPENTE, um mago esta usando a armadura
[color=#00ff00]The equipment is located in SNAKE STONE, a wizard is using armor[/color]




Encantamentos / [color=#00ff00]Enchantments[/color]

Elmo - O tempo do grito reduz em any%
[color=#00ff00]Helmet - The shout timer reduce in any%[/color]

Peito - any% de resistencia ao fogo e gelo
[color=#00ff00]Armor - any% of resistance to fire and ice[/color]

Luvas - Ataques do poder causam any% mais danos, +30 pontos de resistencia a ataques e ataques do poder
[color=#00ff00] Gloves - Power attacks deal any% more damage, +30 points of resistance for atacks and power atacks[/color]

Botas - any% de resistencia a magia
[color=#00ff00]Boots - any% of resistence to magic
[/color]
Espada - Queima os dragoes, causando 20 pontos de danos
[color=#00ff00]Sword - Burn dragons and cause 20 points of damage[/color]

Escudo - Reflete any% de danos
[color=#00ff00]Shield - Reflect any% of damage[/color][/center]
author: Darkmano
